title: EF Education-Cannondale Finalizes ‘Bold’ and ‘Fearless’ Roster for Debut Season
content:
The American squad confirms a 15-rider roster that includes Veronica Ewers, Alison Jackson, Kristen Faulkner, and Coryn Labecki.

Read the full article at EF Education-Cannondale Finalizes ‘Bold’ and ‘Fearless’ Roster for Debut Season on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
